description: We've created five procurement frameworks. London boroughs can use four of them to hire consultants more quickly and cheaply

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Our Professional services frameworks (PSFs) are a suite of five frameworks designed to help bodies like the London boroughs procure external consultancy services more quickly and cost effectively. They are replacing the Engineering \u0026 project management framework."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Project \u0026 programme management and commercial services","Rail engineering (not available for London boroughs)","Transport planning \u0026 impact monitoring","Health \u0026 safety services and environmental services","Multi disciplinary services"]}
Each framework comes with a briefing pack which includes information and documents needed to make use of the framework, including:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Framework award by supplier","Framework award by sub category","Company account manager details","Framework scope","Grade definitions","Call off schedules"]}
A template of the agreement for each framework is also included.
